```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, 
                     size = body_mass_g,
                     color = species)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_classic(base_size = 16) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FF8100", "#C75BCB", "#057575")) +
  guides(size = "none",
         color = "none")

```
